apiKeyDescription: Enter your Gemini API key to start using the extension
howToGetApiKey: How to Get Your API Key
apiKeyStep1: Visit Google AI Studio at https://aistudio.google.com/api-keys
apiKeyStep2: Sign in with your Google account
apiKeyStep4: Copy the generated API key and paste it above
apiKeyPrivacy: Your API key is stored locally and never shared
deleteApiKeyConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your API key?
